Subject: DrillBit and StarScream
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

"I dont want to argue over this. I dont trust you Megatron, you left us
to die once before. Killfest, I dont think she would say that."
He turned to StarScream.
"Lets go, StarScream. We will be better off on our own then with them."
He took one last look at the corps of KitKat.
"Good bye my love."
He started to walk out.
"Ok StarScream."
As he walked past Killfest.
"If you end up fighting Megatron, do me one favor, KILL HIM!"
